name: v0.7.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_cypress",
    sha256 = "cedfbe4e8ea71c88aed6d6fd44b50895d68051502b199de72c6bd3815aa1d543",
    strip_prefix = "rules_cypress-0.7.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/releases/download/v0.7.0/rules_cypress-v0.7.0.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_cypress setup #
######################
# Fetches the rules_cypress dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@aspect_rules_cypress//cypress:dependencies.bzl", "rules_cypress_dependencies")

rules_cypress_dependencies()

load("@aspect_rules_cypress//cypress:repositories.bzl", "cypress_register_toolchains")

cypress_register_toolchains(
    name = "cypress",
    cypress_version = "13.6.6",
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//js:toolchains.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "rules_js_register_toolchains")

rules_js_register_toolchains(node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:repositories.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    lifecycle_hooks_exclude = [
        # Speed up installation by disabling cypress binary install. Optional.
        "cypress",
    ],
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: update bcr maintainer info by @kormide in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/97
* feat: Support version 14.0.0 by @mrmeku in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/98

## New Contributors
* @kormide made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/97

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/compare/v0.6.0...v0.7.0

body:

```starlark

    name = "cypress",

    name = "npm",
```

## What's Changed
* chore: Integrate rules_lint and format files by @mrmeku in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/78
* feat: upgrade to rules_js 2.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/68
* chore: bump miminum dep to aspect_bazel_lib 2.7.6 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/85
* chore: bump to rules_js 2.0.0-rc1 and minimum aspect_bazel_lib 2.7.7 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/86
* chore: add --check_direct_dependencies to .bazelrc by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/87
* chore: bump minimum rules_nodejs to 6.2.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/88
* chore: green up BCR presumbit CI by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/89
* chore: upgrade to rules_js v2 by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/90


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0

name: v0.6.0-rc0
body:
> [!IMPORTANT]  
> This release requires requires rules_js 2.x. It is not compatible with rules_js 1.x. rules_js 2 is currently in RC: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/releases/tag/v2.0.0-rc0

WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_cypress",
    sha256 = "b4a811bd5d89a060856610626b7cb8ffd3bdf2bdb6d6c2b6c44203488c2c636e",
    strip_prefix = "rules_cypress-0.6.0-rc0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/releases/download/v0.6.0-rc0/rules_cypress-v0.6.0-rc0.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_cypress setup #
######################
# Fetches the rules_cypress dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@aspect_rules_cypress//cypress:dependencies.bzl", "rules_cypress_dependencies")

rules_cypress_dependencies()

load("@aspect_rules_cypress//cypress:repositories.bzl", "cypress_register_toolchains")

cypress_register_toolchains(
    name = "cypress",
    cypress_version = "13.6.6",
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//js:toolchains.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "rules_js_register_toolchains")

rules_js_register_toolchains(node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:repositories.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    lifecycle_hooks_exclude = [
        # Speed up installation by disabling cypress binary install. Optional.
        "cypress",
    ],
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: Integrate rules_lint and format files by @mrmeku in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/78
* feat: upgrade to rules_js 2.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/68


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0-rc0

name: v0.6.0-alpha.0
body:
> [!IMPORTANT]  
> rules_js maintainers are working towards a rules_js 2.0 RC release. Breakings changes in the underlying provider API require that all downstream rulesets have major releases such as this one. We don't recommended upgrading to this alpha release. For more information on the rules_js 2.0 release see the tracking issue https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/issues/1671.

WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_cypress",
    sha256 = "0f309cf66ac655a62ffdada50398a4a3edf4afbaa47874f0edeca6a699a84089",
    strip_prefix = "rules_cypress-0.6.0-alpha.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/releases/download/v0.6.0-alpha.0/rules_cypress-v0.6.0-alpha.0.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_cypress setup #
######################
# Fetches the rules_cypress dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@aspect_rules_cypress//cypress:dependencies.bzl", "rules_cypress_dependencies")

rules_cypress_dependencies()

load("@aspect_rules_cypress//cypress:repositories.bzl", "cypress_register_toolchains")

cypress_register_toolchains(
    name = "cypress",
    cypress_version = "13.6.6",
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//js:toolchains.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "rules_js_register_toolchains")

rules_js_register_toolchains(node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:repositories.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    lifecycle_hooks_exclude = [
        # Speed up installation by disabling cypress binary install. Optional.
        "cypress",
    ],
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: Integrate rules_lint and format files by @mrmeku in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/78


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0-alpha.0

name: v0.5.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_cypress",
    sha256 = "bca909724a07bd52c9c0b01b461e1df019c3af28aecfd98de924c1d7c358166e",
    strip_prefix = "rules_cypress-0.5.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/releases/download/v0.5.0/rules_cypress-v0.5.0.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_cypress setup #
######################
# Fetches the rules_cypress dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@aspect_rules_cypress//cypress:dependencies.bzl", "rules_cypress_dependencies")

rules_cypress_dependencies()

load("@aspect_rules_cypress//cypress:repositories.bzl", "cypress_register_toolchains")

cypress_register_toolchains(
    name = "cypress",
    cypress_version = "13.6.6",
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//js:repositories.bzl", "rules_js_dependencies")

rules_js_dependencies()

load("@bazel_features//:deps.bzl", "bazel_features_deps")

bazel_features_deps()

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    lifecycle_hooks_exclude = [
        # Speed up installation by disabling cypress binary install. Optional.
        "cypress",
    ],
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: tidy repo by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/70
* chore: add BCR metadata by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/71
* chore: add missing cypress versions from 10.0.0 to 13.6.6 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/75
* fix: Disable sandboxing for cypress_test rules by @mrmeku in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/66
* chore: don't cancel concurrent main builds by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/79
* chore: various cleanups by @mrmeku in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/76
* fix: node toolchain should be a dev dependency in MODULE.bazel by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/83
* chore: bump to GitHub Action actions/cache@v4 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/81
* refactor: don't default chdir to package_name() in _cypress_test_macro [BREAKING] by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/84


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0

name: v0.4.0

```starlark
)

```


## What's Changed
* chore: Use aspect_bazel_lib bazelrc flags by @mrmeku in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/62
* chore: Move tests to e2e/workspace folder by @mrmeku in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/63
* chore(deps): Migrate to bzl mod dependencies by @mrmeku in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/61
* Add example of how to spawn testing server by @mrmeku in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/65


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/compare/v0.3.4...v0.4.0

```starlark
load("@aspect_rules_cypress//cypress:dependencies.bzl", "rules_cypress_dependencies")
load("@aspect_rules_cypress//cypress:repositories.bzl", "cypress_register_toolchains")

rules_cypress_dependencies()

cypress_register_toolchains(
    name = "cypress",
    cypress_version = "12.12.0",
)
```


## What's Changed
* fix: rename LATEST_VERSION to LATEST_CYPRESS_VERSION by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/38
* feat: update to rules_js 1.27.0 and pickup fixed_args feature by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/40
* ci: enable buildifier check on ci by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/41
* chore: bump rules_js dep to 1.29.2 to pickup Windows fix by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/42
* chore: Update Cypress Version by @justinba1010 in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/39

## New Contributors
* @jbedard made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/38
* @justinba1010 made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/39

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0

name: v0.2.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_cypress",
    sha256 = "17bc702e70e972fad8936e35f872f1e6e7235142c908561eba0a1dd84729167c",
    strip_prefix = "rules_cypress-0.2.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/releases/download/v0.2.0/rules_cypress-v0.2.0.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_cypress setup #
######################
# Fetches the rules_cypress dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@aspect_rules_cypress//cypress:dependencies.bzl", "rules_cypress_dependencies")
load("@aspect_rules_cypress//cypress:repositories.bzl", "cypress_register_toolchains")

rules_cypress_dependencies()

cypress_register_toolchains(
    name = "cypress",
    cypress_version = "12.3.0",
)
```


## What's Changed
* perf: use rules_js Bazel 6 optimized fs patches if using Bazel 6 and experimental_allow_unresolved_symlinks is on by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/pull/37


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0
